member.name: WS_XML_STRING_DESCRIPTION
member.summary: This type description is used with and is optional. It is used to specify constraints on the set of values which can be deserialized.

member.name: WS_XML_STRING_DESCRIPTION.minByteCount
member.summary: The minimum number of bytes of UTF8 character data.

member.name: WS_XML_STRING_DESCRIPTION.maxByteCount
member.summary: The maximum number of bytes of UTF8 character data.
